document.docAuthor: Siddiqui, Junaid Ali, Bodlah, Imran, Carpenter, James M., Naeem, Muhammad, Ahmad, Munir & Bodlah, Muhammad Adnan
document.masterDocTitle: Vespidae (Hymenoptera) of the Pothwar region of Punjab, Pakistan

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Vespidae (Hymenoptera) of the Pothwar region of Punjab, Pakistan

heading.emphasis:
Vespa velutina Lepeletier
de
Saint Fargeau, 1836

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Vespa velutina
“ De Haan” Lepeletier de
Saint Fargeau, 1836
: 507
, ♀, [ Indonesia ] “ Inde : Java” (Torino?).

Vespa auraria
Smith, 1852
: 46
, pl. VIII, fig. 8 , ♀, “Northern India ” (London, Oxford?).

Vespa crabro
var. immaculata
Morawitz, 1889
: 161
, ♀, [ China ] “Kansu. Nanpin.” (St. Petersburg), nom. praeocc., nec.
Vespa immaculata Gmelin, 1790
.

Vespa fruhstorferi
Stadelmann, 1894
: 89
, ♀, [ Indonesia ] “in den alpinen Theilen von West-Java auf dem Gunung-Gede ... in einer Höhe von 8000 Fuss” (Berlin?).

Vespa velutina
var. ardens
du
Buysson, 1905
: 550
, ♀, ♂, [ Indonesia ] “Lombok, Sapit (
2000 ’
...); I. Sumbawa, près Java” (Wien, Budapest, München, Paris).

Vespa auraria
var. nigrithorax
du
Buysson, 1905
: 553
, ♀, ♂, [ India ] “Dardjiling” ( lectotype ♀ Paris).

Vespa velutina
var. Celebensis
Pérez, 1910
: 12
, ♀, [ Indonesia ] “Bua-Kraeng (Sud-Célèbes)” (Paris).

Vespa velutina
var. Megei
Pérez, 1910
: 13
, ♀, “Koueï-Tchéou ( Chine centrale)” (Paris).

Vespa Mongolica
var. divergens
Pérez, 1910
: 16
, ♀, [ Malaysia ] “Perak” ( lectotype Paris).

Vespa flavitarsus
Sonan, 1929
: 137
(key), 142 , ♀, [ Taiwan ] “Taiko-san (Kagi)” (coll. M. Kato).

Vespa velutina sumbana
van der
Vecht, 1957
: 34
(key), 40 , ♀, ♂, [ Indonesia ] “Kananggar, E. Sumba, 700 m ” ( holotype ♀ Leiden).

Vespa velutina variana
van der
Vecht, 1957
: 35
(key), 37 , ♀, “North Siam ... Doi Hua Mot, 3000 ’“ (Leiden).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Vespa velutina karnyi
van der
Vecht, 1957
: 35 (key), 38 , ♀, ♂, [ Indonesia ] “Bandar Buru, Deli” ( holotype ♀ Leiden).
Vespa velutina timorensis
van der
Vecht, 1957
: 35 (key), 40 , ♀, [ Indonesia ] “Mollo, 1350 m , Timor” (Basel); also from another locality on Timor.

Vespa velutina floresiana
van der
Vecht, 1957
: 35 (key), 40 , ♀, [ Indonesia ] “Labuan Badjo, Fores” (Leiden).
Vespa velutina pruthii
van der
Vecht, 1959
: 228 , ♀, [ India ] “Kashmir, Srinagar” (Calcutta).

Distribution. Pakistan , Bhutan , Vietnam , China , Indonesia , Taiwan Laos , Thailand , Malaysia , Myanmar and India ; introduced into France , Spain and Portugal (Carpenter & Kojima 1997 ,
Dvořák 2007
,
Mahmood et al. 2012
).

Comments. These specimens were compared with the published description by
Mahmood et al. ( 2012 )
. This species can be recognized on basis of following characters: first and second metasomal segments with apical yellow band and 4 th to 6 th segments are golden. New locality records have been provided for this species.
